aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Usage plan optimized for MVP scale (200 req/min target)
Allows API Gateway to perform operations on DynamoDB users table

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.alarmDescription: Alert when User API has high error rate (4xx/5xx)
